Information.faq_1_title: How do I become a VIP member?
Information.faq_1_desc: We currently offer the best rates to all clients without registration.
Information.faq_2_desc: Valid ID for transactions under 1,000 EUR. Additional proof for higher amounts.
Information.faq_3_desc: No. We are transparent. 0% commission on all cash exchanges.
Information.faq_4_desc: Yes, via phone or at branch.
